name: Double Flappy
description:
Guide the two flappy things through the gaps in the walls. Fun x2 (almost) guaranteed!

Controls: Left/Right: flap left/right thing.

A game in 550 characters of code for TweetTweetJam 5

This game was made for #TweetTweetJam and contains only 550 characters of code, including art. The code is below:

_set_fps(60)cls(1)z,r,f,m,h=mid,rectfill,128,64,0::s::x,y,u,v,t,p=m,m,0,0,0,{}for i=1,999do p[i]=32+rnd(m)end::_::for i=1,999do pset(rnd(f),rnd(f),1)end t+=.5w=flr(t/m)h=max(h,w)x-=u y-=v u-=.025v-=.025 if(btnp(0))u=.9 if(btnp(1))v=.9 r(0,0,f,0,4)r(0,127,f,127) ?"➡️",16,x,10 ?"➡️",64,y,12 for i=1,f do a,b=i*m+m-t,p[i]if z(-6,a,f)==a then r(a,b-f,a+6,b-20,4)r(a,b+f,a+6,b+20,4) if(a==z(10,a,22)and z(b-19,x,b+15)!=x)goto s if(a==z(58,a,70)and z(b-19,y,b+15)!=y)goto s end end if(x!=z(x,124)or z(y,124)!=y)goto s ?"s:"..w.."\nh:"..h,8,8,15 flip()goto _
